staticContent.newsArticleLegalText: London Stock Exchange plc is not responsible for and does not check content on this Website. Website users are responsible for checking content. Any news item (including any prospectus) which is addressed solely to the persons and countries specified therein should not be relied upon other than by such persons and/or outside the specified countries. Terms and conditions, including restrictions on use and distribution apply.
staticContent.newsArticleLegalTextFootnote: © 2024 London Stock Exchange plc. All rights reserved.
staticContent.ndSummary: The London Stock Exchange is pleased to provide real time UK regulatory news announcements to the general public for personal use. Please declare your status before proceeding.
staticContent.privateInvestorColumnBody:
A Private Investor is a recipient of the Information who meets all of the conditions set out below, the recipient:

  • obtains access to the Information in a personal capacity;
  • is not required to be regulated or supervised by a body concerned with the regulation or supervision of investment or financial services;
  • is not currently registered or qualified as a professional securities trader or investment adviser with any national or state exchange, regulatory authority, professional association or recognised professional body;
  • does not currently act in any capacity as an investment adviser, whether or not they have at some time been qualified to do so;
  • uses the Information solely in relation to the management of their personal funds and not as a trader to the public or for the investment of corporate funds;
  • does not distribute, republish or otherwise provide any Information or derived works to any third party in any manner or use or process Information or derived works for any commercial purpose.
staticContent.rnsCustomerColumnBody:
An RNS Customer is a recipient of the Information who meets all of the conditions set out below, the recipient:

  • obtains access to the Information in a professional capacity on behalf of their employer, who has signed a RNS Service Agreement and who submits announcements for publication through RNS on a regular basis;
  • is not currently registered or qualified as a professional securities trader or investment adviser with any national or state exchange, regulatory authority, professional association or recognised professional body;
  • does not currently act in any capacity as an investment adviser, whether or not they have at some time been qualified to do so;
  • uses the Information solely in relation to the management of their regulatory disclosure requirements, or in an advisory capacity related to the same;
  • does not distribute, republish or otherwise provide any Information or derived works to any third party in any manner or use or process Information or derived works for any commercial purpose.
staticContent.professionalInvestorColumnBody:
A Professional Investor is a recipient of the Information who meets any of the conditions set out below, the recipient:

  • obtains access to the Information in a professional capacity;
  • is required to be regulated or supervised by a body concerned with the regulation or supervision of investment or financial services;
  • is currently registered or qualified as a professional securities trader or investment adviser with any national or state exchange, regulatory authority, professional association or recognised professional body;
  • currently acts as an investment adviser, whether or not they have at some time been qualified to do so;
  • uses the Information as a trader to the public or for the investment of corporate funds;
  • distributes, republishes or otherwise provides Information to a third party or creates (for a commercial purpose) derived works using the Information
staticContent.rnsDenialMessage:
The London Stock Exchange is pleased to provide real time UK regulatory news announcements to the general public for personal user and to RNS customers in a professional capacity.

If you are a professional investor, access to delayed UK regulatory news announcements (meaning announcements older than 60 minutes) is available for historical reference. Access to real time UK regulatory news announcements is not accessible via the London Stock Exchange website.


Please click here to return to the News page.


Alternatively, if you are a professional investor and require access to real time UK regulatory news announcements, please note that real time RNS information is widely available across a large number of data vendor service offerings to professional investors.

value.title: Board Committee Change
value.body:
RNS Number : 1862X
Lloyds Banking Group PLC
18 December 2023
 

18 December 2023

 

LLOYDS BANKING GROUP: CHANGE TO MEMBERSHIP OF THE AUDIT COMMITTEE

 

The Group is pleased to announce that Amanda Mackenzie, an independent non-executive director and Chair of the Responsible Business Committee, has been appointed as a member of the Audit Committee with effect from 1 January 2024.

 

- END -

For further information:

Investor Relations

Douglas Radcliffe

Group Investor Relations Director

Email: douglas.radcliffe@lloydsbanking.com

 

Group Corporate Affairs

Matt Smith

Head of Media Relations

Email: matt.smith@lloydsbanking.com

 

+44 (0) 20 7356 1571

 

 

 

 

+44 (0) 7788 352 487

 

 

This information is provided by RNS, the news service of the London Stock Exchange. RNS is approved by the Financial Conduct Authority to act as a Primary Information Provider in the United Kingdom. Terms and conditions relating to the use and distribution of this information may apply. For further information, please contact rns@lseg.com or visit www.rns.com.

RNS may use your IP address to confirm compliance with the terms and conditions, to analyse how you engage with the information contained in this communication, and to share such analysis on an anonymised basis with others as part of our commercial services. For further information about how RNS and the London Stock Exchange use the personal data you provide us, please see our Privacy Policy.
 
END
 
 
BOANKFBPNBDDPBD
